text: Mark-Paul Gosselaar (born March 1, 1974) is an American actor. He is well known for his roles on television. He played Zack Morris on Saved by the Bell. He also played the detective John Clark on ABC's NYPD Blue. Gosselaar was born in the Los Angeles area of California. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:1974 births Category:Living people
title: Mark-Paul Gosselaar
